title: English
body: I moved to Korea because of my girlfriend and decided to have an account there but i do not speak Korean at all. SO i wonder if there is anyway i could have the game in english? I mean we're in 2017 no way a game with that reputation could not have an option right ? >.>

replies.body:
At this point, English is not one of the [**supported languages**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751594) on the Korean servers. Each server has a list of languages that are available for you to choose, sadly though English just isn't an available option quite yet.

P.S. Changing those game files could potentially break the game, so I wouldn't necessarily suggest doing that.

I think that's a good idea. And in the meantime, there's a forum discussion about changing it here. I gave it a try and it didn't work for me, but it might work for you. http://forums.na.leagueoflegends.com/board/showthread.php?t=1918453
